name: TheCartPress – Quickpay Payment Gateway
author: PerfectSolution

sections.description: Quickpay for TheCartPress allows you to accept credit cards via Quickpay in your TCP shop. If you already have a subscription with Quickpay, you are good to go in less than 5 minutes with this plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘thecartpress-quickpay’ folder to /wp-content/plugins/ on your server.
  2. Log in to WordPress administration, click on the ‘Plugins’ tab.
  3. Find ‘TheCartPress – Quickpay Payment Gateway’ in the plugin overview and activate it.
  4. In the wp-admin navigation to the right, go to: ‘(TheCartpress) Settings’ -> ‘Payment Methods’
  5. Find ‘TheCartPress – Quickpay Payment Gateway’ in the list of available payment methods and press ‘Edit’.
  6. Choose to create a new instance and fill in all the fields in the section and save the settings.
  7. You are good to go.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Support for v10 manager. The old manager is no longer supported.
  • Add autofee

1.0.0

  • First commit

short_description: Integrate your Quickpay payment gateway with TheCartPress.
description: Quickpay for TheCartPress allows you to accept credit cards via Quickpay in your TCP shop. If you already have a subscription with Quickpay, you are good to go in less than 5 minutes with this plugin.
